# VisualShaderNodeTexture2DParameter

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeTextureParameter](class_visualshadernodetextureparameter.md) **<** [VisualShaderNodeParameter](class_visualshadernodeparameter.md) **<** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Provides a 2D texture parameter within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Translated to ``uniform sampler2D`` in the shader language.
